definition: to aspire to travel far and make one's mark (idiom)
(located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: Once in mind is in all directions young, envy fly south of wild goose.
sentences.chinese: 曾经志在四方少年，羡慕南飞的雁。

sentences.english: Have ambition at everywhere and not idealistic and not practical, stand on solid ground but challenge extreme limit again.
sentences.chinese: 志在四方又不好高骛远，脚踏实地而又挑战极限。
